text:
New appointment at Four Points by Sheraton Pune Published on : Wednesday, August 12, 2015
Four Points by Sheraton Hotel & Serviced Apartments Pune, has announced the appointment of Joe Pereira as Executive Assistant Manager. He has a wealth of hospitality operation and management experience, with his career commencing over 11 years ago.
Joe started his career with Goa Marriott Resort as the Guest Service Associate, and later worked under several designations with Taj Krishna Hyderabad, Taj Holiday Village, Goa, Ramada Caravela Beach Resort, Goa and Ramada Caravela Beach Resort, Goa.
Joe’s journey with Four Points by Sheraton Pune began in 2012, as Rooms Division Manager. As the Executive Assistant Manager at Four Points by Sheraton, Pune, he will be responsible for the hotel operations and leading the hotel to delighting guests with their hospitality.
With his vast industry expertise and incomparable proficiency, Joe has been able to deliver excellence consistently by being attentive and constantly thinking of new ways to improve his skills as well as those of his team. Apart from being a dynamic presenter with team spirit, Joe’s constant urge to learn and absorb as much as he can and an impeccable ability to complete any task immaculately, has given him the opportunity to work in some of the most renowned enterprises in the industry.
Joe has also been honored with prestigious awards from Goa Marriott Resort in 2005. Apart from hospitality industry, he was also associated with America Online, where he was awarded as “Consultant of the month” in two different departments (Billing & Technical).
“Given ‘Four Points by Sheraton’s position as a leading brand in the premium business hotel segment, I am looking forward to my new position as Executive Assistant Manager. I am eager to develop new and creative ways to engage Four Points’ already strong group of repeat visitors and introduce the Global guests to a wonderful experience with their stay at Four Points by Sheraton, Pune”, said Joe on his appointment.
Source:-Four Points by Sheraton
